title: DevGame ad
author: VD
content_html: I realize that most of you who are already interested in the course have already signed up, but I thought you might be interested in seeing this anyhow. And if you haven’t signed up yet, you can do so here. As those who were at the most recent Brainstorm can testify, it will be substantive and you will learn a lot about the game industry.
content_text:
I realize that most of you who are already interested in the course have already signed up, but I thought you might be interested in seeing this anyhow. And if you haven’t signed up yet,
you can do so here
. As those who were at the most recent Brainstorm can testify, it will be substantive and you will learn a lot about the game industry.
